work.summary: Take media assets and turn them into Storyline courses that work on the iPad for online training in five languages.
highlights: Load courses into learning management system and setup tracking.

work.summary: Support the sales department in the transition of online product training over to the iPad.
highlights: Develop an interactive scoreboard to check team scores while they compete against each other for first place during a six month training program; technologies used were PHP, MySQL, HTML5, CSS, Jquery and designed graphics.
Use Storyline to build multiple courses for online training in a learning management system.
Use Camtasia or Premiere Pro to edit video
Use Adobe Audition to edit audio
Build an interchange file for Mzingaâ€™s LMS to batch import learning events and mass enroll students.
Add assessments to learning management system and link them to courses.

work.summary: Support the sales department in the transition of online product training over to the iPad.
highlights: Develop HTML5 web pages with CSS and Jquery to organize Sales videos for the School of Sales department.
Edit audio with Adobe Audition to use with PowerPoint slides.
Build courses with Storyline or Articulate.
Add courses to the School of Sales learning management system.
Focus on optimizing web pages and courses to work on the iPad.
Used Camtasia or Premiere Pro to capture and edit video.
Help the front-end development of an information-learning portal get up to speed do to an outside vender falling behind schedule.
Install Wordpress on server and built a table to display course progress to users.

education.area: New Media Compositing, Authoring and Distribution

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
